summary: This mod increases the size of argonian tail, so they look actually much better.
descriptionHtml:
[b]SSE version: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9773/?[/b]

BAT - Bigger Argonian Tails 1.0.2
=========================================================================
This mod increases the size of argonian tail (both males and females), so they look actually much better.
(check out images for comparision)

=========================================================================
Changelog:
1.0.1 - hopefully I've fixed female tail twist issue :)
1.0.1 - added female version - requested by Heianqt1
1.0 - initial release

=========================================================================
Installation:
Extract archive to your Skyrim game folder

=========================================================================
Uninstallation:
Delete:
/data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/maletailargonian.nif
/data/meshes/actors/character/character assets/femaletailargonian.nif

=========================================================================
Incompatibilities:
Anything that changes maletailargonian.nif or femaletailargonian.nif file
This mod should be compatible with all skin texture replacers

=========================================================================
Mods used in screenshot:
JazzJR Argonian retexture - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7712
Extended Slider Colors - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6923
Grimoas Plantigrade Feet For Beast Races - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16976
Male Cleric Armor - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12629
SkyRe - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9286

=========================================================================
Tools used:
3ds max
Nifskope
author: Fearil
